verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered בִּלְדַּ֥ד <S%H1085><s%> Bildad הַשֻּׁחִ֗י <S%H7747><s%> the Shuhite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> How long אָ֤נָה ׀ <S%H575><s%> How תְּשִׂימ֣וּן <S%H7760><s%> [will it be ere] ye make קִנְצֵ֣י <S%H7078><s%> an end לְמִלִּ֑ין <S%H4405><s%> answer תָּ֝בִ֗ינוּ <S%H995><s%> understanding וְאַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> and afterwards נְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> we will speak

מַ֭דּוּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why נֶחְשַׁ֣בְנוּ <S%H2803><s%> Wherefore are we counted כַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> as beasts נִ֝טְמִ֗ינוּ <S%H2933><s%> [and] reputed vile בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

טֹֽרֵ֥ף <S%H2963><s%> He teareth נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> himself בְּאַ֫פּ֥וֹ <S%H639><s%> in his anger הַ֭לְמַעַנְךָ <S%H4616><s%> because of תֵּעָ֣זַב <S%H5800><s%> be forsaken אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> shall the earth וְיֶעְתַּק־ <S%H6275><s%> be removed צ֝֗וּר <S%H6697><s%> for thee? and shall the rock מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> country

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Indeed א֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> Yea the light רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יִדְעָ֑ךְ <S%H1846><s%> shall be put out וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִ֝גַּ֗הּ <S%H5050><s%> shall not shine שְׁבִ֣יב <S%H7632><s%> and the spark אִשּֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H784><s%> of his fire

א֭וֹר <S%H216><s%> The light חָשַׁ֣ךְ <S%H2821><s%> shall be dark בְּאָהֳל֑וֹ <S%H168><s%> in his tabernacle וְ֝נֵר֗וֹ <S%H5216><s%> and his candle עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> above יִדְעָֽךְ׃ <S%H1846><s%> shall be put out

יֵֽ֭צְרוּ <S%H3334><s%> shall be straitened צַעֲדֵ֣י <S%H6806><s%> The steps אוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H202><s%> of his strength וְֽתַשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <S%H7993><s%> shall cast him down עֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6098><s%> and his own counsel

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> For he is cast בְּרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> into a net בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> by his own feet וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂ֝בָכָ֗ה <S%H7639><s%> upon a snare יִתְהַלָּֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> and he walketh

יֹאחֵ֣ז <S%H270><s%> shall take בְּעָקֵ֣ב <S%H6119><s%> [him] by the heel פָּ֑ח <S%H6341><s%> The gin יַחֲזֵ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> shall prevail עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and צַמִּֽים׃ <S%H6782><s%> [and] the robber

טָמ֣וּן <S%H2934><s%> [is] laid בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for him in the ground חַבְל֑וֹ <S%H2256><s%> The snare וּ֝מַלְכֻּדְתּ֗וֹ <S%H4434><s%> and a trap עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> on נָתִֽיב׃ <S%H5410><s%> for him in the way

סָ֭בִיב <S%H5439><s%> on every side בִּֽעֲתֻ֣הוּ <S%H1204><s%> shall make him afraid בַלָּה֑וֹת <S%H1091><s%> Terrors וֶהֱפִיצֻ֥הוּ <S%H6327><s%> and shall drive לְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> him to his feet

יְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become רָעֵ֥ב <S%H7457><s%> shall be hungerbitten אֹנ֑וֹ <S%H202><s%> His strength וְ֝אֵ֗יד <S%H343><s%> and destruction נָכ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> [shall be] ready לְצַלְעֽוֹ׃ <S%H6763><s%> at his side

יֹ֭אכַל <S%H398><s%> It shall devour בַּדֵּ֣י <S%H905><s%> the strength עוֹר֑וֹ <S%H5785><s%> of his skin יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> shall devour בַּ֝דָּ֗יו <S%H905><s%> his strength בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> [even] the firstborn מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

יִנָּתֵ֣ק <S%H5423><s%> shall be rooted out מֵ֭אָהֳלוֹ <S%H168><s%> of his tabernacle מִבְטַח֑וֹ <S%H4009><s%> His confidence וְ֝תַצְעִדֵ֗הוּ <S%H6805><s%> and it shall bring לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him to the king בַּלָּהֽוֹת׃ <S%H1091><s%> of terrors

תִּשְׁכּ֣וֹן <S%H7931><s%> It shall dwell בְּ֭אָהֳלוֹ <S%H168><s%> in his tabernacle מִבְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> because [it is] none ל֑וֹ יְזֹרֶ֖ה <S%H2219><s%> shall be scattered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on נָוֵ֣הוּ <S%H5116><s%> upon his habitation גָפְרִֽית׃ <S%H1614><s%> of his brimstone

מִ֭תַּחַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash שָֽׁרָשָׁ֣יו <S%H8328><s%> His roots יִבָ֑שׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> shall be dried up וּ֝מִמַּ֗עַל <S%H4605><s%> beneath and above יִמַּ֥ל <S%H5243><s%> be cut off קְצִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H7105><s%> shall his branch

זִֽכְרוֹ־ <S%H2143><s%> His remembrance אָ֭בַד <S%H6><s%> shall perish מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has no שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and he shall have no name ל֝֗וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> accept חֽוּץ׃ <S%H2351><s%> abroad

יֶ֭הְדְּפֻהוּ <S%H1920><s%> He shall be driven מֵא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> from light אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> into darkness וּֽמִתֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> out of the world יְנִדֻּֽהוּ׃ <S%H5074><s%> and chased

לֹ֘א <S%H3808><s%> has no נִ֤ין <S%H5209><s%> He shall neither have son ל֣וֹ וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has no נֶ֣כֶד <S%H5220><s%> nor nephew בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> among his people וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Nor שָׂ֝רִ֗יד <S%H8300><s%> nor any remaining בִּמְגוּרָֽיו׃ <S%H4033><s%> in his dwellings

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at י֭וֹמוֹ <S%H3117><s%> at his day נָשַׁ֣מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> [him] shall be astonied אַחֲרֹנִ֑ים <S%H314><s%> They that come after וְ֝קַדְמֹנִ֗ים <S%H6931><s%> as they that went before אָ֣חֲזוּ <S%H270><s%> are seized שָֽׂעַר׃ <S%H8178><s%> horror

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely אֵ֭לֶּה <S%H428><s%> such מִשְׁכְּנ֣וֹת <S%H4908><s%> Surely such [are] the dwellings עַוָּ֑ל <S%H5767><s%> of the wicked וְ֝זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> and this מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and this [is] the place לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדַֽע־ <S%H3045><s%> [of him that] knoweth אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> not God ס
